item.title: Ejabberd SSL Certificate
item.description: This tutorial shows you how to set up an SSL Certificate for use with Ejabberd. It covers both the creation of the Certificate Signing Request, the preparing of the certificate for use with Ejabberd and the installation of the certificate.

item.title: Ejabberd Active Directory LDAP Login
item.description: This tutorial shows you how to set up ejabberd to authenticate to an Active Directory LDAP.

item.title: Set up a federated XMPP Chat Network with ejabberd, your own Google Talk Hangouts alternative
item.description: This tutorial shows you how to set up your own federated chat network using ejabberd. It covers a basic single node ejabberd server and also the setup of an ejabberd cluster, including errors and DNS SRV record examples. Last but not least federation is also covered.
